```{r map_capture, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
require(tidyverse); require(sf); require(knitr); require(leaflet)

secteurs <- tribble(
  ~what, ~latitude, ~longitude, 
  "Nouveau-Brunswick", 46.0640097,-66.2818157,
  "Capitale-Nationale",47.2110091,-70.7304825,
  "Forillon", 48.9031234,-64.3796644, 
  "Vérendrye - Hautes Laurentides", 47.140186, -77.015181,
  "Bas-St-Laurent",48.112315, -67.795112
)
secteurs$veaux=c(24,24,8,19,24)
secteurs$adultes=c(0,0,15,0,0)

secteurs_sf =secteurs %>%
  st_as_sf(coords = c("longitude", "latitude"), crs = 4326) #What does crs mean?

leaflet(secteurs,width = "100%") %>% 
  addTiles(options = providerTileOptions(minZoom=4, maxZoom=8)) %>% 
  addCircleMarkers(
    radius = 15,
    color = "orange",
    stroke = FALSE,
    fillOpacity = 0.5,
    popup= paste("Région / Region : ", secteurs$what,"<br>",
                 secteurs$veaux, "veaux capturés / calves captured", "<br>",
                 secteurs$adultes,"adulte.s capturé.s / adult.s captured", "<br>")
  ) %>%  
  setView(lat=47.2110091, lng=-70.7304825, zoom=6) %>% 
  leafem::addMouseCoordinates() %>% 
  addMiniMap(
    tiles = providers$Esri.WorldStreetMap,
    toggleDisplay = FALSE)


```
